TopicTitle: I got 1.0.5 and made a thing

Articles.Content:
I downloaded it, made a new game, built 3 rockets, the 3rd got me to orbit. I decided to take a picture (like anyone) and ended up with a series. So I stiched them together, and present:

A Kerbal Photo Mosiac: Daytime in the West

(Just where my craft passed over)

What? You don't like it? I'd love to see your mosiacs.
Nicely done. Now launch into a polar orbit and show us the entire planet.
